original_title: … denn die Musik und die Liebe in Tirol
overview: Music student Susanne and her cousin Monika inherit an alpine pasture. They have no idea that their hut is being used by a gang of smugglers as a temporary storage facility. While Susanne and her friends use the paradisiacal place to celebrate and play music, the crooks try all sorts of tricks to get hold of their hot goods.
title: … denn die Musik und die Liebe in Tirol
